ascr asus smart contrast ratio technolog: ASCR (ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio) technology automatically adjusts the luminance of the backlight for better displays according to the image contents, and improves the contrast ratio to 10,000,000:1 - resulting in more realistic depictions of night scenes during games or movies.
splendid video intelligence technology: The exclusive Splendid Video Intelligence technology optimizes video performance and image fidelity by enhancing color, brightness, contrast, and sharpness. 5 preset video modes (scenery, theater, game, night view, and standard) can be selected via a hotkey.
